name: Space Trouble (DatAlles)
description:
Welcome to Space trouble where you need to shoot asteroids to protect the ship!

Use WASD or Mouse, or Arrow Keys depending on your liking. 

Full screen recommended.

Please support by donating.
Check out my Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHdTCT9VSIkWc-yBU8ssU3w

Remember to keep buying upgrades to get stronger and better for the next Boss fight!!

Enjoy the game!!
